name: AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading
desc: A protocol for loading the media and metadata of an asset or asset track without blocking the calling thread.

items.name: func status<T>(of: AVAsyncProperty<Self, T>) -> AVAsyncProperty<Self, T>.Status
items.desc: Returns a value that indicates the status of a property.

items.name: func load<T>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, T>) -> T
items.desc: Loads a property asynchronously and returns the value.

items.name: func load<A, B>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>) -> (A, B)
items.desc: Loads two properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>) -> (A, B, C)
items.desc: Loads three properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C, D>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, D>) -> (A, B, C, D)
items.desc: Loads four properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C, D, E>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, D>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, E>) -> (A, B, C, D, E)
items.desc: Loads five properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C, D, E, F>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, D>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, E>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, F>) -> (A, B, C, D, E, F)
items.desc: Loads six properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C, D, E, F, G>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, D>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, E>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, F>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, G>) -> (A, B, C, D, E, F, G)
items.desc: Loads seven properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: func load<A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H>(AVAsyncProperty<Self, A>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, B>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, C>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, D>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, E>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, F>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, G>, AVAsyncProperty<Self, H>) -> (A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H)
items.desc: Loads eight properties asynchronously and returns the values.

items.name: class AVAsyncProperty
items.desc: An asynchronous property that constrains its type and value.

items.name: class AVPartialAsyncProperty
items.desc: An asynchronous property that constrains its type.

items.name: class AVAnyAsyncProperty
items.desc: A base class for asynchronous properties.

items.name: func loadValuesAsynchronously(forKeys: [String], completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Tells the asset to load the values of all of the specified keys that arenâ€™t already loaded.

items.name: func statusOfValue(forKey: String, error: NSErrorPointer) -> AVKeyValueStatus
items.desc: Returns a status that indicates whether a property value is immediately available without blocking the calling thread.

items.name: enum AVKeyValueStatus
items.desc: Values that indicate the loaded status of a property.
